title: The Dragon's Appraiser: Part Three
description: As they fall back into their old routine, Madja begins to wonder if it’s enough for her. Can she really spend her life with a man who will always care more about himself than her?  For all his gold and power, Sevrrn is helpless to protect Madja when she becomes gravely ill. Facing the possibility of her death, he’s forced to reevaluate his priorities. But is it too late?  This is the final novella in an ongoing story and is not a standalone.
author: Viola Rivard
